amendment.description: To provide additional resources for border infrastructure and program integrity initiatives.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4557 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4557 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S7306-7307; text: CR S7306-7307) To provide additional resources for border infrastructure and program integrity initiatives.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4557 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4557 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
